definitions.definition: A person whose occupation specializes in the science of physics , especially at a professional level.
A believer in the theory that the fundamental phenomena of life are to be explained upon purely chemical and physical principles (opposed to vitalist ).

main_definition: A person whose occupation specializes in the science of physics , especially at a professional level.
secondary_definitions: ( archaic ) A believer in the theory that the fundamental phenomena of life are to be explained upon purely chemical and physical principles (opposed to vitalist ).
